      • DealCard

        public DealCard(java.lang.String image,
                int money,
                java.lang.String text,
                int sell)
        Constructor:
        instantiates a new Deal Card and initializes all it's values Preconditions:
        imageURL must be valid
        money greater or equal to 0
        sell greater or equal to 0
        Parameters:
        image - the imageURL of the card
        money - the cost of the card
        text - the text that the card should display
        sell - the sell value of the card
